title:

Semiconductor Stock

Learn More In this video, I will go over Qualcomm's (QCOM -0.44%) recent earnings report and crucial points mentioned during the earnings call. If you missed Nvidia's huge run-up and still want to get exposure to semiconductors and AI, Qualcomm might be the next best thing. *Stock prices used were from the trading day of Feb. 1, 2024. The video was published on Feb. 1, 2024. Neil Rozenbaum has no position in any of the stocks mentioned. The Motley Fool has positions in and recommends Nvidia and Qualcomm.
